Room.Name: Monument Avenue
Room.ShortDescription: You are travelling down Monument Avenue, just south of the Shrine of Moradin.
Room.LongDescription: On the north side of the road, you can see the Dwarven Shrine of Moradin, the creator of the Dwarven Race. All dwarves worship Moradin as if the world is going to end tomorrow. Such dedication and faith has in the past given dwarves the extra moral boost they need to defeat nearly impossible odds. On the southern side of the road is the Obidian Community Housing Complex, where most of the city's citizens, who want to live in the city, live.
